AppFooter.tagline: The Global Agricultural Supply Chain Platform.

marketplacePage.title: Global Marketplace
marketplacePage.description: Discover agricultural products, equipment, and services from around the world.
marketplacePage.noItemsHint: Try adjusting your search or filters.

create.title: Create a New Listing
create.description: Share a product or service with the DamDoh network.

form.namePlaceholder: e.g., Organic Hass Avocados, Tractor Rental Service
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Provide a detailed description of your product or service.
form.locationPlaceholder: e.g., Nairobi, Kenya or California, USA
form.sustainableDescription: This item or service utilizes or promotes sustainable practices.
form.skillsPlaceholder: List the key skills or qualifications for this service.

talentExchangePage.title: Talent Exchange
talentExchangePage.description: Find skilled professionals and services across the agricultural value chain.
talentExchangePage.searchPlaceholder: Search by skill, service, or professional...
talentExchangePage.noResultsDescription: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later for new listings.

ProfilePage.tempDisplayNotice: Note: This is a temporary display of raw profile data. A more user-friendly layout will be implemented soon.
ProfilePage.recentActivityDescription: A summary of recent actions taken by this user on {appName}.
ProfilePage.notFoundDescription: The profile you are looking for does not exist or has been removed.
ProfilePage.universalIdModalDescription: Present this QR code to authorized agents or partners to securely share your public profile information.

notificationsPage.title: Notifications
notificationsPage.description: Recent activity from across the DamDoh platform.
notificationsPage.placedNewOrder: placed a new order for one of your items.

attendees.title: Event Attendees
attendees.description: View and manage all registered attendees for this event.
attendees.noAttendees: No attendees have registered for this event yet.

recoverPage.title: Account Recovery
recoverPage.description: Regain access to your account using your trusted network.
recoverPage.step1: Enter your phone number to start.
recoverPage.step2: Show the generated QR code to a trusted friend on DamDoh.
recoverPage.step3: Your friend scans the code to confirm your identity, restoring your access.
recoverPage.scanDescription: Have a trusted DamDoh connection scan this temporary QR code with the 'Help a Friend' feature.
recoverPage.scanNote: This code is valid for 10 minutes.

editProfilePage.title: Edit Profile for {name}
editProfilePage.description: Update your public-facing information. Your changes will be visible to other users on the platform.

networkPage.title: Discover Your Network
networkPage.description: Find and connect with stakeholders across the entire agricultural supply chain.
networkPage.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, role, or summary...
networkPage.noStakeholdersHint: Try adjusting your search filters or check back later.

errors.title: Error
errors.load: Could not load the blog post. Please try again later.

notFound.title: Post Not Found
notFound.description: The blog post you are looking for does not exist.

searchPage.title: Search DamDoh
searchPage.description: Find exactly what you're looking for across our entire platform.

aiHelper.title: AI Post Helper
aiHelper.description: Don't know where to start? Give the AI a prompt and it will generate a draft for you.
aiHelper.promptPlaceholder: e.g., What are the best natural methods to control aphids on kale?

createPost.title: Start a New Discussion
createPost.description: Share your knowledge or ask a question to the community.

form.titlePlaceholder: A clear, engaging title for your post
form.contentPlaceholder: Elaborate on your question or idea here...

aiPromptMissing.title: Prompt Required
aiPromptMissing.description: Please enter a prompt for the AI to generate a draft.

aiDraft.title: AI Draft Failed
aiDraft.description: There was an error generating the draft. Please try again.

incomplete.title: Incomplete Post
incomplete.description: Please provide both a title and content for your post.

general.title: Error
general.description: Could not create the post. Please try again.

aiDraft.title: Draft Generated!
aiDraft.description: Your post has been drafted by AI. Feel free to edit it before submitting.

hero.title: Cultivating Connections, Harvesting Success with {appName}
hero.subtitle: The all-in-one platform for the entire agricultural supply chain. Connect with farmers, buyers, and experts to grow your business and build a sustainable future.

features.title: A Toolbox for Growth
features.subtitle: DamDoh provides everything you need to manage, market, and grow your agricultural business.

networking.title: Smart Networking
networking.description: Connect with verified stakeholders. Find farmers, buyers, input suppliers, and logistics partners with our AI-powered suggestion engine.

marketplace.title: Global Marketplace
marketplace.description: Buy and sell products, equipment, and services. Expand your reach beyond local markets and find new opportunities.

forums.title: Knowledge Forums
forums.description: Share your expertise, ask questions, and learn from a community of agricultural professionals in dedicated discussion forums.

talent.title: Talent Exchange
talent.description: Offer your professional services or find skilled labor, from custom harvesting to agronomy consultation.

forWho.title: A Platform for the Entire Ecosystem
forWho.description: Whether you're planting seeds or delivering the final product, DamDoh is designed to support your role in the supply chain.

farmers.title: Farmers & Cooperatives
farmers.description: Manage your farm, track your produce with VTIs, and get direct access to buyers and financial services.

buyers.title: Buyers & Processors
buyers.description: Source high-quality, traceable products directly from producers and ensure supply chain integrity.

experts.title: Experts & Service Providers
experts.description: Offer your expertise, find new clients, and contribute to a more efficient agricultural sector.

cta.title: Ready to Grow with DamDoh?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of agricultural professionals building a more connected and sustainable future.

FarmManagement.title: Farm Management Hub
FarmManagement.description: Your central command center for all farming operations. Track crops, manage inputs, view financials, and access educational guides.

myFarms.title: My Farms & Crops
myFarms.description: Oversee all your farms, plots, and active crop cycles. Track progress from planting to harvest.

knf.title: KNF Input Assistant
knf.description: Create and track your Korean Natural Farming inputs like FPJ and FAA with guided recipes and reminders.

financials.title: Money Matters
financials.description: A simple way to track your farm's income and expenses to understand profitability.

assetManagement.title: Asset Management
assetManagement.description: Keep a record of your farm equipment, tools, and other valuable assets. (Coming Soon)
